title: Optimized and Improvement
body: - Optimized site with reducing load time

title: Add new technology and other update
Update layouts
body: - Add dotted background in 'ready to build' section
- Update 'build by me' text in footer

title: New changes and improvement
body: - Add spacing between social icons and contact buttons

title: Improved dark mode & updates
body: - Update border color of cube in dark mode and add noise texture

title: Changes
body: - Change tab name 'Plug-ins' -> 'Add-on' in technologies section
- Add new useMeta() hook for change tab title

title: Improve animation & Updates
body: - Add micro animation to popover toggles
- Update about page layout and add new images

title: Add new page
body: - Add changelog page to see all changes log

title: Add new screenshots and updates
body: - Add new screenshots of ypca project
- Fix the aspect ratio of project screenshots
- Add new badge 'Get An Invitation' in achievements

title: Improved dark mode
body: - Add two shaded background color for dark mode
- Add smooth animation between theme switching

title: Refresh the site
body: Now it more cleaner, more structured, scalable, and more optimized
